metadata.title: CVE-2020-24513 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Domain-bypass transient execution vulnerability in some Intel Atom(R)Processors may allow an authenticated user to potentially enableinformation disclosure via local access.

criterions.comment: intel-microcode: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
